verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] facing mounting pressure , from both Democrats and Republicans , to end his administration 's policy of separating children from their undocumented immigrant parents at the border .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is facing mounting pressure , from both Democrats and Republicans , to [V: end] [ARG1: his administration 's policy of separating children from their undocumented immigrant parents at the border] .

President Donald Trump is facing mounting pressure , from both Democrats and Republicans , to end his administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their undocumented immigrant parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] .
